entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain showers with a few flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
